name: measure-oh-sung
description: Python 백엔드와 Next.js 프론트엔드로 구성된 프로젝트

scripts.type-check:backend: cd backend && python -m mypy app/ --config-file mypy.ini
scripts.type-check:all: npm run type-check && npm run type-check:backend
scripts.dev:type-safe: npm run type-check:all && npm run dev
scripts.setup: npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend
